markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Gyronna (The Angry Hag)](/Deities.aspx?ID=153)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Expose hypocrisy (real or imagined) in others, make other creatures miserable, demand bribes to spare creatures from your torments

**Anathema** Allow others to slight you without retaliation, seek the approval of society, forgive those who have wronged you

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Favored Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=23), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=24), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ill Omen](/Spells.aspx?ID=696)

- **2nd**
[Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214)

- **6th**
[Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112)

</column>
name: Gyronna (The Angry Hag)
